title: Hana, Hana, and Hana!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Haaah~, the weather is so nice~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>The breeze also feels good zura~. There are so many flowers blooming too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Well, it’s spring after all. Ah, why don’t we stop by that juice stand over there? Some fresh juice will be delicious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>That sounds great! Let’s get some and walk a bit more~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah, look. There are flowers floating around in the juice. I wonder if you could eat them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Flowers that you could eat are called “edible flowers”. Maru has read about them before in a book zura. As expected of Tokyo, even the juice stands are fancy....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I wonder what they taste like?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>We won’t know until we try it zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>....Ah. Hanayo and Hanamaru-chan eat some Hana (flowers).... is that a pun!? Let’s message that to Ai-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>We’ll have to take a picture too then. Excuse me, we’ll have two of this juice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
